member.name: T:VBScripting.IconExtractor
member.summary: Extracts an icon from a .dll or .exe file.

member.name: M:VBScripting.IconExtractor.Extract(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Extracts an icon from a .dll or .exe file.
member.param: An integer. The icon's index within the resource.
A boolean. True for a large icon, False for a small icon.
